entry.title: Vinyl Bonded Foam Rolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Foam Flooring
Price: 0.00

Carpet bonded foam is used for most martial arts, gymnastics, fitness, wrestling and training studios along with trampoline air parks.  The foam flooring can be used for other high impact areas for dance, martial arts, and even as wall padding.

Vinyl bonded crosslinked polyethylene foam with vinyl top layer is available in 2 thicknesses.

Kodiak vinyl bonded foam is designed with flexible/slit backing.

Vinyl bonded foam is available in the standard Polyethylene.

Standard Rolls Specs

  • Size: 6'W x 42'
  • Standard PE rolls are available in 1-3/8” and 2″ thicknesses.

Kodiak also manufactures vault runways, as well as sizes of practice mats of different sizes.

Colors Available:

Black, Blue, Light Gray, Purple, Red, and Yellow

Custom Sizes:

Custom size vinyl bonded rolls are not offered at this time.

entry.title: Velcro For Carpet Bonded Foam 4"W x 42'L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Foam Flooring
Price: 44.99

Kodiak sells Velcro for carpet bonded foam is sold in 4"W x 42'L Rolls.

The 4"W Velcro holds the carpet bonded foam rolls together by joining the face fiber on the rolls.

The 4" hook/width is also ideal for simulating a floor balance beam. Velcro can be used to mark zones on the floor or separate areas with different colors.

The Velcro hook will only stick to carpet bonded foam NOT to Flex Floor Ex carpet. 

Standard Rolls Specs

  • Size: 4"W x 42'L

Colors Available:

Black, Blue, Charcoal, Green, Light Gray, Orange, Pink, Purple, Red, and Teal.

Custom Sizes:

Not available at this time, all Velcro rolls are 42'L

entry.title: Carpet Bonded Foam Rolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Foam Flooring
Price: 0.00

Carpet bonded foam is used for most gymnastic, cheerleading studios along with trampoline air parks.  The foam flooring can be used for other high impact areas for dance, martial arts, and even as wall padding.

Kodiak Carpet bonded foam is available in solid/flat backing or the flex/slit backing.

Carpet bonded foam is available in the standard Polyethylene, EVA foam option is also available.

What's the difference? EVA foam is considered a premium foam. It’s slightly softer and more flexible. There is presumed to be some additional rebound and shock absorption as well.

Standard Rolls Specs

  • Size: 6'W x 42'
  • Standard PE rolls are available in 1-3/8” and 2″ thicknesses.
  • EVA backed rolls are available in 1-1/2″ and 2″ thicknesses. 

Kodiak also manufactures vault runways, as well as sizes of practice mats of different sizes.

Colors Available:

Black, Blue, Charcoal, Green, Light Gray, Orange, Pink, Purple, Red, and Teal.

Velcro

Rolls come with velcro to join. You get 1 velcro strip per seam.
IE: Order 1 Roll, no velcro. Order 2 rolls, you get 1 strip of velcro. Order 4 rolls, you get 3 strips of velcro.

Custom Sizes:

Custom size carpet bonded foam rolls are available with a longer lead time(4 weeks)
Max Width: 78"
Max Length: 90'

entry.title: Foam Pit Cubes & Blocks for Gymnastics, Fitness and Training
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Foam Cubes
Price: 159.99 - 165.99 (20 variants)

Foam Pit Cubes are used for training scenarios when soft landings are needed for many odd shaped devices or people impacting the ground doing extreme activities.

The high grade open cell polyurethane cubes are fire retardant.  The cubes offer 45 ILD foam with a density of 1.45 lbs.  The cubes come in 6" and 8" sizes and meet California Technical Bulletin 117 safety standards and are Fire Retardant.

Flat mats and other mats don't work well for stunt landing, aerial work, gymnastic work that requires the athlete to push their body to the extreme...landing safely in the cubes allows athletes to let go of fear and allow them to perform.

ORDER MINIMUM:

Minimum order now requires at least 4 packs...we are unable to fulfill small cube orders below that minimum due to freight being 2-3 x the cost of product.

entry.title: Kodiak EcoSafe Folding Gym Floor Mats - 2.5" Thick Combo Foam
entry.summary:
Vendor: CoverSports
Type: Fitness Mats
Price: 189.99 - 499.99 (90 variants)

The 2.5" Thick combo one layer of Extra-firm bonded foam to one layer of the Flex-firm foam; which is slightly softer This provides a semi-soft cushioning with a firm landing and stable shock absorption for medium impact activities. The extra firm layer prevents bottoming out from impact.

It is softer/more cushioning than the medium firm mats; and will be less stable for static activities/exercises. Your feet will sink into the mat and it is not for high impact activity.  Great for home exercise activity and general fitness applications.

Uses

  • Fitness / Gym Mats
  • Martial Arts
  • Beginner and Intermediate Gymnastics
  • Home Workouts

Features

  • Made in the USA!
  • Toxin-free
  • Latex-free
  • Hypo-allergenic
  • Fire-retardant
  • 100% recyclable

entry.title: Kodiak EcoSafe Folding Gym Floor Mats - 2" Thick Flex-Firm
entry.summary:
Vendor: CoverSports
Type: Fitness Mats
Price: 189.99 - 499.99 (90 variants)

The 2" Thick flex-firm foam provides soft cushioning for low impact activities. Ideal for teaching basic gymnastic exercises with young children. The flex-firm foam is for low shock absorption.

It is softer/more cushioning than the medium firm mats; and will be less stable for static activities/exercises. Your feet will sink into the mat and it is not for high impact activity.  Great for home exercise activity and general fitness applications.

Uses

  • Fitness / Gym Mats
  • Low Level Gymnastics
  • Home Workouts

Features

  • Made in the USA!
  • Toxin-free
  • Latex-free
  • Hypo-allergenic
  • Fire-retardant
  • 100% recyclable

entry.title: Kodiak EcoSafe Folding Gym Floor Mats - 1 3/8" Thick Extra Firm
entry.summary:
Vendor: CoverSports
Type: Fitness Mats
Price: 159.99 - 429.99 (90 variants)

The 1 3/8" Thick foam high density offers firm, lightweight shock absorption for top recoil. Provides stable
landing surface that won’t bottom out. The extra firm mats provides firm footing and “street conditions”, no sinking.

The extra firm mats provide impact cushion; but stability on ankles, joints and wrists.

Uses

  • Fitness / Gym Mats
  • Advanced Gymnastics
  • Cheerleading

Features

  • Made in the USA!
  • Toxin-free
  • Latex-free
  • Hypo-allergenic
  • Fire-retardant
  • 100% recyclable
